name: Cozy Cottage
description:
Welcome to "Cozy Cottage" nestled in the serene locale of Gisborne, offering a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Priced at a steal for $200,000, this charming abode boasts 2 snug bedrooms and 2 immaculate bathrooms, ensuring comfort and convenience for its lucky inhabitants.

Picture yourself unwinding in the cozy ambiance of this cottage, where every corner exudes warmth and relaxation. Whether you're curling up with a book by the fireplace or savoring a cup of tea on the quaint porch, each moment spent here promises to be nothing short of blissful.
